game.name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 페인트리스가 다시는 죽음을 그리지 못하게, 33 원정대를 이끌고 페인트리스를 처치하는 여정을 떠나세요. 벨 에포크 시대의 프랑스에서 영감을 받은 경이로운 세계를 탐험하며, 실시간 메커니즘이 가미된 턴제 RPG에서 개성적인 적들과 맞서 싸우세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in this turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics.

reviewHighlights.text: People trying to review bomb this game for AI Generated content. After also being upset and lookinf more into it, its important to note: The AI was us...
Played it in gamepass, but decided to buy here to support devs. One of the best games of the decade.
